description:
The Willough at Naples provides treatment for adults suffering from addictive disorders and co-occurring mental health & substance abuse issues (Dual Diagnosis). Our 87-bed facility is run by a team of nurses, counselors, doctors, and administrative staff, and serves Naples, Miami, Fort Myers, and all other communities of southern Florida.

By offering both residential services with 24-hour care and partial hospitalization programs, The Willough can assist individuals at any stage of the recovery process. 

Licensed & Accredited. Insurance Welcome.
The Joint Commission National Quality Approval Seal
The Willough at Naples is a state-licensed, Medicare-approved, and Joint Commission Accredited facility. 

###COL###
name: THE WILLOUGH AT NAPLES
